Posts.Content: Ween - Just writing because you made me laugh regarding "chatting with yourself". I'm on this site because I'm a nervous wreck waiting for my results. Didn't like the tech saying she wanted to include the lymph nodes on a routine screening. Glad yours is OK.
Posts.Title: Call Back for a Second Mammogram

Posts.Content: Evidently I am among the 10% or so called back due to a false positive. There was tissue folded over that appeared to make one side look different from the other (asymmetry). The last ten days of waiting were agony and I'm grateful to have dodged the bullet. To put things into perspective, I sat with a woman who was having her 9th biopsy at the age of 38 and she very calmly told me that she was considering a double mastectomy due to her family history and constant problems. I can't say enough about the women who endure hell and fight back to live a normal healthy life. My heart goes out to each and every one of them.
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Anyone get a mammogram callback due to asymmetry. They said no lumps or calcifications showed up and I'm frantic waiting for the diagnostic appointment. I know the statistics but wanting to hear from someone first hand.
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Thanks for the update. Couldn't be happier for you!!!! Now life can get back to normal.
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: No, there were no problems last year. The tech also made sure that she got lymph nodes in the picture. That seemed strange to me also. I'm going to be a nervous wreck waiting for results.
Posts.Title: HELP - mammogram tech scared me!

Posts.Content: I just had my yearly mammogram today and after taking a couple of xrays (actually they were digital) the tech pulled out the old pictures from last year and looked at them. I've never had them do that before. Do you think she saw something and was comparing??? HELP please.
Posts.Title: HELP - mammogram tech scared me!

Posts.Content: But is the tech qualified to look at films and determine if more should be taken?
Posts.Title: HELP - mammogram tech scared me!

Posts.Content: Hi eddysmom - My appt. isn't until next Tues (waiting is agony) so I have no news other than the ob-gyn who let me know that her report showed asymmetry. I've read EVERYTHING on the internet and even though I have the stats, it doesn't make me feel any better. I'm in limbo. What about you - did you insist on a biopsy?
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Please let me know how your appt goes next Thursday. I'll be thinking of you. I've researched everything on call backs due to asymmetry. Even though the odds are in my favor, if there's a 1% chance of cancer and I'm in that 1%, the odds don't mean a thing. I believe in preparing for the worst, and although many people wouldn't agree, it's my nature.
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Will be happy to post next week!
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Now it's your turn for some awesome news. Make sure to post after your Thurs. appointment!
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2

Posts.Content: Congrats Eddysmom! Now that you've seen a specialist for a second opinion, you can breathe easier. Everything I've read about "the needle", (from women who've gone through it) seems to indicate that it's very quick and not bad at all. Like you said, compared to the alternatives, it will be a piece of cake. Hopefully, neither of us will be posting next year after our mammograms!
Posts.Title: Asymmetry Callback 1 2
